routes.name: Electricity Sales to Ultimate Customers
routes.description:
Electricity sales to ultimate customer by state and sector (number of customers, average price, revenue, and megawatthours of sales).  
    Sources: Forms EIA-826, EIA-861, EIA-861M

routes.name: Electric Power Operations (Annual and Monthly)
routes.description:
Monthly and annual electric power operations by state, sector, and energy source.
    Source: Form EIA-923

routes.name: Electric Power Operations (Daily and Hourly)
routes.description:
Hourly and daily electric power operations by balancing authority.  
    Source: Form EIA-930

routes.name: Inventory of Operable Generators
routes.description:
Inventory of operable generators in the U.S.
    Source: Forms EIA-860, EIA-860M

routes.name: Electric Power Operations for Individual Power Plants (Annual and Monthly)
routes.description:
Annual and monthly electric power operations for individual power plants, by energy source and prime mover
    Source: Form EIA-923
